Text: Bones (bull):  The Brand of Honor designation is comparable to a hall of fame induction for the PBR.
Triplets:<Bones
4:
--------------------
<Text: Bones (bull):  Bones was also awarded the World Champion Bull title in 2008 and 2010 at the PBR World Finals.>
Triplets:<Bones
6:
--------------------
<Text: Bones (bull):  Two other bulls, Little Yellow Jacket and Bushwacker, won the award three times.>
Triplets:<Bones
8:
--------------------
<Text: Bones (bull):  Bones lives on Teague's ranch in his retirement.>
Triplets::<Bones
